#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long lint;

char s[200000],opr;
lint T;
long double ans,num[3];

int main(){
  	
	scanf("%lld",&T);
	
	while( T-- ){
		scanf(" ");
		gets(s);
		lint j = 0;
		for( lint i=0 ; s[i] ; i++ )
			if( s[i] != ' ' )
				s[j++]=s[i];
		
		s[j] = 0;
		j = 0;
		lint i = 0 , neg = 0 , negc = 0;
		if( s[0] == '-' ){
			neg = 1;
			i++;
		}
		
		ans = num[0] = num[1] = num[2] = 0;
		
		for( ; s[i] ; i++ ){
			if( j and s[i] == '-' ){
				neg = 1;
				continue;
			}
			if( s[i] == 'x' )
				num[j] = 0;
			else if( s[i] >= '0' and s[i] <= '9' )
				num[j] = num[j]*10 + s[i]-'0';
			else{
				if( neg )
					num[j] = -num[j];
				if( !num[j] and neg )
					negc = 1;
				neg = 0;
				j++;
				if( j == 1 )
					opr = s[i];
			}
		}
		if( neg )
			num[j] = -num[j];
		if( !num[j] and neg )
			negc = 1;

		if( !num[0] ){
			
			if( opr == '-' )
				ans = num[2] + num[1];
			else if( opr == '+' )
				ans = num[2] - num[1];
			else if( opr == '*' )
				ans = num[2] / num[1];
			else
				ans = num[2] * num[1];
			
		} else if( !num[1] ){
			
			if( opr == '-' )
				ans = num[0] - num[2];
			else if( opr == '+' )
				ans = num[2] - num[0];
			else if( opr == '*' )
				ans = num[2] / num[0];
			else
				ans = num[0] / num[2];
			
		} else {
			
			if( opr == '-' )
				ans = num[0] - num[1];
			else if( opr == '+' )
				ans = num[0] + num[1];
			else if( opr == '*' )
				ans = num[0] * num[1];
			else
				ans = num[0] / num[1];
			
		}
		
		if( !negc )
			printf("%.6LF\n",ans);
		else
			printf("%.6LF\n",-ans);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
